sense.gloss: to lean against, to lean on, to recline on
to lie heavy (on the stomach), to be uneasily digested

sdata.j: ステーキは↑胃↑↓い↓に|もたれる|。
sdata.e: Steak lies heavy on the stomach.

sdata.j: ↑食後↑↓しょくご↓↑胃↑↓い↓が|もたれる|。
あともう↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑物事↑↓ものごと↓に↑前向↑↓まえむ↓きになることを↑学↑↓まな↓んだら、きっとトムももうちょっと↑人↑↓ひと↓から↑好感↑↓こうかん↓を|もたれる|のだが。
sdata.e: If Tom would learn to be a little more positive about things, people would probably like him a bit more.
